examples: Cripps pink apples add a pop of color and a sweet-tart taste to my fruit salad.
My best friend's pink hair definitely raised a few eyebrows at our very strict school.
The pig's pink skin was covered in coarse hair.
Thousands of factory workers have been given the pink slip in recent months.
Fast food chains removed pink slime from their menus to regain trust.
words.defineEn: having the color of strawberry ice cream
words.defineVi: có màu kem dâu tây

words.defineEn: having a bright pinkish-red color
words.defineVi: có màu đỏ hồng tươi

words.defineEn: a bright and vibrant shade of pink that is often associated with Mexican culture
words.defineVi: một màu hồng rực rỡ và rực rỡ thường gắn liền với văn hóa Mexico

words.defineEn: a specific shade of pink that is believed to have calming and appetite-suppressing effects
words.defineVi: một sắc thái cụ thể của màu hồng được cho là có tác dụng làm dịu và ức chế sự thèm ăn

words.defineEn: a vibrant shade of pink with a reddish-purple hue, resembling the color of the amaranth flower
words.defineVi: một sắc hồng rực rỡ với sắc đỏ tím, giống như màu của hoa rau dền

examples: Spare his blushes.
The manager spoke for his young employee in order to spare her blushes.
Liam whispered sweet nothings into Jane's ear, making her blush and smile.
I tried saving her blushes when she asked me to prom by saying I had no intention of going with anyone.
The way he looked at her, his eyes on stalks, made her blush and feel desired.
words.defineEn: a soft, delicate shade of pink with a subtle hint of peach, reminiscent of the natural flush that appears on the cheeks
words.defineVi: một sắc hồng mềm mại, tinh tế với một chút hồng đào phảng phất, gợi nhớ đến vẻ ửng hồng tự nhiên trên má

words.defineEn: a vibrant, rich shade of pink that is reminiscent of the color of blooming roses
words.defineVi: một sắc hồng rực rỡ, phong phú gợi nhớ đến màu của những bông hồng đang nở rộ

words.defineEn: a soft, delicate shade of pink that exudes a sense of sweetness, innocence, and charm
words.defineVi: một sắc hồng nhẹ nhàng, tinh tế toát lên cảm giác ngọt ngào, ngây thơ và quyến rũ

words.defineEn: a pale, muted shade of pink that resembles the subtle hues of rose petals
words.defineVi: một màu hồng nhạt, im lặng giống như màu sắc tinh tế của cánh hoa hồng

examples: Orchids display beautiful patterns to attract their favorite pollinators: bees and flies.
Cities, like nations, like orchids, are organic things.
That isn’t an orchid at all.
It’s an orchid mantis, an insect native to the rainforests of Southeast Asia.
Like their close kin, orchid mantises will even rock back and forth like a flower swaying in the breeze.
words.defineEn: a delicate and soft shade of pinkish-purple, reminiscent of the hues found in the petals of orchid flowers
words.defineVi: một sắc thái tinh tế và mềm mại của màu hồng tím, gợi nhớ đến màu sắc được tìm thấy trong những cánh hoa phong lan

examples: He shared a juicy peach with his friend during a picnic in the park.
Peaches are packed with antioxidants that help protect your body against harmful free radicals.
They spent the afternoon pitting the peaches for their summer jam.
I bit into a ripe peach and enjoyed its sweet flesh.
Sarah made a refreshing peach iced tea to beat the summer heat.
words.defineEn: having a moderate color between pink and orange
words.defineVi: có màu vừa phải giữa hồng và cam

words.defineEn: a vibrant and saturated shade of pink, used in traditional Persian textiles and art

words.defineEn: a bright and vivid shade of pink, reminiscent of the color of a bonbon candy
words.defineVi: một màu hồng sáng và sống động, gợi nhớ đến màu của kẹo bonbon

words.defineEn: having a pinkish orange color like the flesh of a salmon
words.defineVi: có màu cam hồng như thịt cá hồi

words.defineEn: a soft and delicate shade of pink, resembling the color of tea rose petals
words.defineVi: một sắc hồng mềm mại và tinh tế, giống như màu của những cánh hoa hồng trà

words.defineEn: a light and muted shade of pink, often associated with a soft and delicate aesthetic

words.defineEn: a bright and vibrant shade of pink, resembling the color of a rose or a pink gemstone
